title: Copenhagen shootings: suspect was known to authorities â live updates | World news | The Guardian
summary: shots fired by police at nã¸rrebro station , one person hit .
police believe man they shot was behind both attacks .

text: that concludes this evening 's coverage .
local media have named the suspect in the shootings as 22-year-old omar abdel hamid el-hussein .
police have not confirmed the reports .
danish national broadcasters tv 2 and dr named the man , with the latter - along with newspaper ekstra bladet - reporting that he had recently been released from prison .

the gunman believed to have attacked a copenhagen synagogue and a free-speech event on saturday was a danish-born 22-year-old known to police because of past violence , gang-related activities and possession of weapons , officers have said .
police said they had identified the man , who was killed in an early-morning shootout on sunday , but did not release his name .
the uk 's itv news has interviewed controversial swedish cartoonist lars vilks who may have been the target of the first attack on saturday at an undisclosed location .

he described the attack : we were listening to a lecture and suddenly it started to come , these bang bang sounds , and at first it seemed so unreal then the bodyguards reacted and i understood there was an attack going on .
it was a scare because you did n't know if they were coming to the door what would happen .
danish police have shot dead a man they say was responsible for two fatal shootings in copenhagen one at a freedom of speech rally and one at a synagogue .
the suspect was killed near nã¸rrebro station in central copenhagen in the early hours of this morning after the man opened fire on officers .
he was returning to an address that had been under police surveillance .
police said they knew his identity but could not reveal it because of an ongoing operation , and that he was known to the security services .
armed police raided an internet cafe in a major operation near the spot where officers killed the suspected gunman behind fatal shootings , local media said .
the dead man is thought to have been behind two attacks that took place on saturday in the danish capital .
around 3.30pm local time , the suspect fired a hail of bullets into an art cafe hosting the controversial swedish cartoonist lars vilks .
that shooting left 55-year-old film director finn nã¸rgaard dead and three police officers wounded .
then , some time after midnight , 37-year-old dan uzan was shot multiple times outside copenhagen 's central synagogue in krystalgade and died from his wounds .
two police officers were also shot but survived .
uzan is said to have been a volunteer jewish guard who was protecting a religious ceremony inside the jewish centre .
hundreds of people have begun gathering with candles and flowers outside the synagogue where he was killed .
the toll from the last 24 hours stands at five wounded police officers and three deceased people two of whom were members of the public and the other the suspect shot dead by police .
the israeli prime minister , binyamin netanyahu , caused controversy with a call for the massive immigration of european jews to israel after the attacks .
the european jewish association called for increased protection of jewish institutions across the continent .

birgitte krogh , a primary school teacher who had come to bring flowers to the synagogue was pondering what she was going to tell her eight-year-old pupils in school tomorrow , reports angelique chrisafis .
she said of the synagogue : it 's important to be here to show sympathy but also to show that as a country we ca n't be afraid of one man 's actions .
and to show that everybody is welcome in denmark .
she added : it 's not that we never thought it could happen but we 're used to being safe .
we hear about attacks in paris or london .
but we 're still struggling to think that it could happen here in our little fairytale country .

hundreds of people have begun gathering with candles and flowers outside the synagogue where dan uzan was killed in the early hours of sunday morning as he guarded the entrance to a bat mitzvah party , reports angelique chrisafis in copenhagen .

notes on cards left outside the synagogue included : we are crying for you and : i am a jew , i am a muslim , i am a christian , i am a dane , i will not let fear rule at the synagogue the morning before her party , the girl whose bat mitvah it was had given a very moving speech about peace in the world , and to think her party ended the way it did , said jonatan sousa , an economist at copenhagen city hall and member of the jewish community in the city .
we all knew each other ; it 's a very small jewish community in copenhagen , maybe 5,000 7,000 people .
we knew it could happen ; when we heard of the shooting at the debate we thought the jews could be next .
but the reality of it has left the jewish community deeply shocked , deeply sad .
the fact that right now all the danish people are here and behind us , we 're all grateful for that .
angelique chrisafis ( @ achrisafis ) scores gather outside # copenhagen synagogue where man shot dead , flowers & notes - `` i will not let fear rule ''

documents.title: police raid internet cafe
text: armed danish police raided an internet cafe in a major operation in copenhagen near the spot where officers killed the suspected gunman behind fatal shootings , local media said .
tv2 , which reported from the scene , showed footage of armed officers in dark uniforms outside the internet cafe and said at least two people had been taken away by police .
it 's part of our investigation , a police official told broadcaster dr .
source : afp
copenhagen police have told danish broadcaster dr that a police operation at an internet cafe on nã¸rrebrogade , copenhagen , is part of their investigation into the shootings .
ekstra bladet newspaper reported that four people were arrested by armed police at the internet cafe .
according to the newspaper 's website , police brought out one man in handcuffs .
witnesses told the newspaper that 10-15 officers were working at the scene .
we can not confirm these reports .
saudi arabia condemned the danish attacks , in a statement released on sunday that also deplored the killing of three muslims in north carolina .
the state news agency spa quoted an official source as saying in a statement .

the kingdom of saudi arabia followed with strong sorrow the ugly terrorist and criminal incidents that occurred lately in the danish capital copenhagen and in the us state of north carolina that resulted in the death and injuring of innocent .
in north carolina three young muslims were shot dead last week .
saudi arabia , the birthplace of islam , is a main partner for the us in its campaign against islamist militants in syria and iraq .
the statement said that while it stressed the need to respect religions and human beliefs , it rejected all acts of terrorism and criminal acts in all forms regardless of source .
the kingdom of saudi arabia offers its condolences to the families of terrorism victims and wishes the wounded speedy recovery , it added .
source : reuters
rabbi jair melchior , denmark 's chief rabbi , has paid tribute to dan uzan , who was shot dead in the synagogue attack last night .
melchior said uzan was an irreplaceable security guard protecting the city 's jewish community .
he was a person who was always willing to help .
an amazing , amazing guy , he said .

the guardian 's angelique chrisafis finds people in copenhagen worried about the fallout from saturday 's attacks , which included a shooting at a cafe hosting a debate featuring controversial swedish artist lars vilks , who had de the prophet muhammad in cartoons in 2007 .
two years earlier , the danish newspaper jyllands-posten published 12 satirical cartoons of the prophet .
huma hakimi , who moved to denmark from afghanistan 14 years ago , and worked as a care assistant with old people , said : denmark is a free country that 's what i like about it .
it 's not like afghanistan , you can do and say what you like .
she had experienced no discrimination as a muslim in denmark and said she had n't taken the cartoons ' publication seriously 10 years ago .
bo andersen , 52 , an urban geographer who had lived in the working class north-west of copenhagen for 30 years , said : the national mood is one of shock .
i 'm not surprised by the attacks , but it 's terrible .
it 's a wake-up call about the world we 're living in .
he said he could see the argument for freedom of speech , but could n't understand the reasoning behind publishing controversial cartoons .
i ca n't see any reason you would just publish to make people angry whether it 's muhammad , christ or anyone else .
he said he feared xenophobic politicians would benefit from the attacks , after the far-right danish people 's party had already done well in european elections .
i would really hope for a lot less nationalism , in denmark or europe .
police investigators work at the scene of saturday 's shooting at a free speech event in copenhagen .
probst/ap
the queen of denmark has issued a press release : it is with sorrow that i learn of the extent of the last day 's events .
my thoughts go out to the killed film director and the young security guard from the jewish community , who became targets for the perpetrator 's actions .
i send my deepest sympathy to the relatives and to the injured police officers .
i want to thank the police and the authorities for their quick and efficient efforts .
it is important during such a serious situation that we stand together and protect the values that denmark is founded on .

the guardian 's angelique chrisafis has visited the neighbourhood in north-west copenhagen where the police shot dead the suspect in the attacks in the early hours of this morning , and spoke to witnesses .
she writes : christoffer rosenberg , 25 , a trainee teacher who lives opposite the scene , heard the commotion .
i heard yelling and gunshots at around 5am , i put my head out of the window and saw police swarming , running around , i did n't want to see anyone get killed so i turned away .
rosenberg said the shootings had devastated denmark .
these attacks have been a complete bombshell for the danish population , he said .

he added that he felt an attack had been inevitable at some point after 10 years of extra protection , warnings and foiled attacks since the danish paper jyllands-posten first published cartoons of the prophet muhammad in 2005 .
the idea of freedom of speech is strongly embedded in danish identity .
but at what price ?
it 's a very difficult question to answer .
police carry flowers to the scene of one of the attacks .

the israeli prime minister , binyamin netanyahu , has caused controversy with a call for the massive immigration of european jews to israel after the attacks in copenhagen , in which a 37-year-old jewish security guard was killed .
at the start of a cabinet meeting , netanyahu said the government would be discussing a $ 46m ( â£ 30m ) plan to encourage jewish immigration from france , belgium and ukraine .
he added : this wave of attacks is expected to continue .
jews deserve security in every country , but we say to our jewish brothers and sisters , israel is your home .
the remarks were criticised by jair melchior , denmark 's chief rabbi , who said he was disappointed by netanyahu 's comments .
terror is not a reason to move to israel , he said .
source : ap
the european jewish association has called for increased protection of jewish institutions across the continent in the wake of the copenhagen shootings .
rabbi menachem margolin , the association 's general director , said eu leaders had not done enough to combat antisemitic attacks and prejudices .
in a statement , margolin said there was a need to secure all jewish institutions 24/7 , and demanded european governments and eu institutions take action .
source : ap
police in the german city of braunschweig have cancelled a street parade because of fears of an imminent islamist terror attack , the associated press reports .
police spokesman thomas geese said police received credible information that there was a concrete threat of an attack on sunday 's parade and therefore called on all visitors to stay at home .
braunschweig 's carnival parade is the biggest one in northern germany and draws around 250,000 visitors each year .

geese said the parade was cancelled only 90 minutes before its scheduled start and that many people arriving at the train station were already dressed up and very disappointed but we did n't want to take any risks .
audio captures the moment a gunman opens fire at a copenhagen free speech event .
warning : readers may find this content distressing .
source : bbc
the police said nothing indicated that the suspect had been to conflict zones such as iraq or syria .
the police have found a weapon that they suspect could have been used in the first shooting .
they say they still believe that the man they shot is the gunman behind the two attacks .
they are still trying to piece together the movements of the suspect from when he left the address in nã¸rrebro to the shooting in krystalgade .
jens madsen , head of the danish security and intelligence service pet , said the terror threat was serious .
the suspect was known to security and intelligence services before these attacks , jens madsen , the head of the danish security service pet , said , but did not comment further .
police investigator jã¸rgen skov said the suspect was from copenhagen .
danish police are holding a press conference about the shootings .
they say they know the identity of the suspect but they can not reveal it because of their ongoing investigation .
the danish pm , helle thorning-schmidt , has been speaking at the scene of the synagogue shooting in krystalgade .

she said : the jewish community is a large and integrated part of danish society ¦ we are together with you in your grief¦ together we will shield denmark from the kind of attack we saw last night .
danish national broadcaster dr has named both the victims .
the victim of the first shooting at krudttã¸nden has been named as 55-year-old finn nã¸rgaard , a film director .
the synagogue shooting victim has been named as 37-year-old dan uzan .
dan and his family have paid an unreasonably high price , said dan rosenberg asmussen , the head of copenhagen 's jewish community to the newspaper berlingske .
we are grateful for people who do something to ensure that we can conduct jewish services .
dan was one of those .
many people can be grateful that he was there last night .
meanwhile , police have searched a flat in the residential area of mjã¸lnerparken in nã¸rrebro .
a police spokesman told the newspaper ekstra bladet : police are searching after clues and evidence in relation to the events that took place yesterday and overnight .
the danish prime minister , helle thorning-schmidt , has been holding a press conference about the attacks .

she said : we , as a nation , have lived through some hours which we will never forget ¦ we do n't know the motives of the suspected perpetrator 's actions but we know that there are forces that want to hurt countries like denmark .
they want to suppress our freedom of speech , they want to suppress our belief in religious freedom ¦ we are not in a battle between islam and the west .
it 's not a battle between muslims and non-muslims ¦ it 's time for unity in denmark .
the coming days will be tough to get through .
we have to understand what has hit us , but we must insist on acting as we do .
think and talk like we do .
we ca n't let fear grow roots .
danish pm helle thorning-schmidt speaks to journalists at a cultural centre in copenhagen where the first shooting took place .
bjorn larsen/afp/getty images
according to danish broadcaster dr , there is a police investigation under way this morning in nã¸rrebro , near where the suspect was shot .
police would not confirm whether the investigation was related to the shootings in copenhagen .

documents.title: picture of suspect
text: police in copenhagen have issued a photograph of the main suspect in the synagogue and cafe shootings .
he was shot dead in the early hours of the morning .
the main suspect in the copenhagen shootings .
police/pa
the board of deputies of british jews has issued a statement condemning the attacks in copenhagen .
once again jews at prayer , this time at a copenhagen synagogue on the sabbath , have come under attack in europe .
one jewish man has died and two policemen were wounded .
all were providing security at the place of worship while a bat mitzvah ceremony took place inside .
the synagogue attack followed an earlier murder at a cultural centre in copenhagen where the artist lars vilks , who had received death threats over de of the prophet muhammad , was present .
there a debate was taking place on freedom of speech in light of the recent attacks in paris .
the board of deputies of british jews condemns these attacks in the strongest possible terms .
our thoughts are with the families of all those who were killed and wounded in these shocking attacks in denmark .
we stand in solidarity with the jewish community in denmark and have contacted them to express our sympathy and our support .

documents.title: timeline
text: saturday , around 3.30pm ( 2.30pm gmt ) : a 55-year-old man is killed and three police officers are wounded after the krudttã¸nden cafe in the central ãsterbro district is sprayed with bullets during a free-speech debate involving swedish artist lars vilks , whose cartoons of the prophet mohammed have sparked controversy .
4.15pm : a suspect arrives by taxi at a building complex near nã¸rrebro station in central copenhagen .
4.37pm : the suspect leaves the building complex .
sunday , 1am : a man is shot in the head and two police officers are injured at a synagogue in the centre of copenhagen .
the man was acting as a door guard at a bat mitzvah .

4.50am : the suspect returns to the building complex near nã¸rrebro station which by then is under police surveillance after officerrs have been given access to the surveillance system and exchanges shots with police .
the suspect is shot and killed .
police say they believe the suspect was responsible for both attacks .
7.48am : the danish prime minister , helle thorning-schmidt , praises the police and condemns the cynical act of terror against denmark .
nadia khomami
copenhagen police have issued a press release about events on saturday focusing on the suspect 's movements after the first shooting , which took place at 3.30pm .

here are some of the main points : with the help of an employee in the building complex where a taxi dropped off the suspected gunman after the cafe shooting , police were last night given access to the surveillance system .
an extensive investigation of the video material showed that the suspected gunman arrived around 4.15pm local time , and left shortly after , at 4.37pm .
it has not been possible to identify the suspect from the video footage .
much later , around 4.50am , police officers in the area were made aware that the suspect had returned .
danish police have shot dead a man they say was responsible for two fatal shootings in copenhagen one at a freedom of speech rally and one at a synagogue .
the suspect was killed near nã¸rrebro station in central copenhagen in the early hours of this morning after the man opened fire on officers .
he was returning to an address that had been under police surveillance .
the dead man is thought to be behind two attacks that took place on saturday in the danish capital .
around 3.30pm local time , the suspect fired a hail of bullets into an art cafe hosting the controversial swedish cartoonist lars vilks .
that shooting left a 55-year-old man dead and three police officers wounded .
then , some time after midnight , a man was shot multiple times outside copenhagen 's central synagogue in krystalgade and died from his wounds .
two police officers were also shot but survived .
the deceased man is said to have been a volunteer jewish guard who was protecting a religious ceremony inside the jewish centre .
the toll from the last 24 hours stands at five wounded police officers and three deceased people two of whom are members of the public and the other the suspect shot dead by police .

documents.title: danish pm : a cynical act of terror against denmark
text: the danish prime minister , helle thorning-schmidt , has just issued a statement .
lars eriksen has translated it for us : this is a very sad morning when we all send our thoughts to the victims and their relatives .
two innocent people have lost their lives as the result of a cynical act of terror against denmark .
throughout the day and night , police have acted quickly and focused to ensure citizens ' safety .
i am happy and relieved that police have disarmed the suspected perpetrator behind the two shootings .
i will continue to encourage everyone to follow police instructions and be vigilant .
i would like to express my deepest respect for the police and other authorities ' efforts .
this applies especially to the wounded officers and their colleagues who selflessly put themselves in direct danger to protect us .
the government is closely monitoring developments .
no one should get away with attacking the open , free and democratic danish society .

documents.title: police believe man they shot was behind both attacks
text: police are holding a briefing in copenhagen now .
lars eriksen is watching it for the guardian : police assume it 's the same person who is behind both shootings , and that the person they shot at nã¸rrebro station is the perpetrator .
nothing at this point indicates that there was more than one perpetrator , but they are still investigating the situation .
police said they were n't answering any questions at this stage but that there would be another briefing , probably after lunch .

more details from the wires on the young man gunned down outside the synagogue in krystalgade , via agence france-presse : a man gunned down outside a copenhagen synagogue early on sunday in one of three lethal shootings in the danish capital was jewish , a jewish community group said on sunday .

michael gelvan , chairman of the nordic jewish security council , told afp that a bat mitzvah , or jewish coming of age ceremony , had been under way inside the synagogue and that the young man had been responsible for access control when he was shot .
we do n't know anything yet , it 's too early to guess , he said about possible motives behind the killing .
but it 's a copy of what happened in paris , he said , referring to the deadly attacks at satirical weekly charlie hebdo and a jewish supermarket in january .

in addition to the guard there were extra police outside the synagogue after community leaders contacted authorities following the afternoon gun attack on a debate about islam and free speech at a community centre that left one dead and three police officers wounded .
the two police officers outside the synagogue were wounded but their injuries were not thought to be life-threatening .

i dare not think about what would have happened if ( the killer ) had access to the congregation , the chairman of the jewish community in denmark , dan rosenberg asmussen , told broadcaster tv2 news .

documents.title: what we know so far
text: police have shot dead a person of interest near nã¸rrebro station in central copenhagen about two hours ago after the man opened fire on officers .
he was returning to an address that had been under police surveillance .
it is not yet clear whether the man is behind the shootings at an art cafe and synagogue , which have rocked copenhagen and left two people dead .
a man who was shot multiple times outside copenhagen 's central synagogue in krystalgade has died from his wounds .
two police officers were also shot but have survived .
the deceased man is said to be a volunteer jewish guard who was protecting a religious ceremony inside the jewish centre .
it is not yet known whether the man behind the synagogue killing is the same person who fired a hail of bullets into an art cafe hosting the controversial swedish cartoonist lars vilks .
that shooting left a 55-year-old man dead and three police officers wounded .
police have said they are looking for two perpetrators .
the toll from the last 24 hours stands at five wounded police officers and three deceased people two of whom are members of the public and the other a person of interest shot dead by police .
police have brought their scheduled press conference forward to 8am local time ; that 's about 40 minutes away .

a policeman stands next to a person lying on the ground outside a synagogue , viewed from inside a cafe across the street in copenhagen early february 15 , 2015 reuters/ @ rtridder via reuters tv tv/reuters
a jewish community leader , dan rosenberg asmussen , has told danish tv the man killed in the synagogue shooting was a volunteer guard providing security to a jewish confirmation ceremony .
around 80 people were at the ceremony , asmussen said .
rune wriedt larsen ( @ runewlarsen ) the killed young man was providing security at a jewish confirmation with 80 people in attendance : dan rosenberg asmussen # cphshooting

here 's agence france-presse 's report on the police shooting of a person of interest near nã¸rrebro station about an hour and a half ago : copenhagen police said early on sunday they had shot dead a man who opened fire on officers hours after two people were killed and five wounded in twin shootings in the danish capital .
the police are now investigating if the person could be behind the shootings at krudttã¸nden and the synagogue in krystalgade , police said in a statement .
the exchange of fire took place in the multicultural inner-city neighbourhood of nã¸rrebro where police had been keeping an address under observation earlier in the day .
at one point a person who could be interesting in relation to the investigation arrived at the site , police said .
after police called out to him he opened fire against the police and was thereafter shot , the statement added .
no police officers were injured in the exchange of fire .

a 55-year-old man was killed on saturday when a gunman sprayed bullets at copenhagen 's krudttã¸nden cultural centre as it hosted a seminar in which lars vilks the swedish artist whose controversial prophet muhammad cartoon sparked worldwide protests in 2007 was among the speakers .
hours later , a man was shot in the head and killed early on sunday near copenhagen 's main synagogue in the city centre .
a huge manhunt operation was underway in denmark overnight after the attacker fled following both shootings .
two policemen were wounded in the shooting at the synagogue , and three more officers hurt in the cultural centre attack .

police said they did not have enough information to confirm whether the two shootings , which come just weeks after a series of bloody islamist attacks in paris that left 17 people dead , were linked .
here 's a file image of the synagogue that was the scene of a second shooting in copenhagen some hours ago .
a file photo from 2007 shows the synagogue in central copenhagen , denmark .
/liselotte sabroe danish tv is reporting the victim of that shooting was a young jewish man guarding a community event .

documents.title: 'person of interest ' shot and killed
text: copenhagen police have confirmed that the man they shot at nã¸rrebro station has died .
kã¸benhavns politi ( @ kobenhavnpoliti ) politiet har skudt og drã¦bt en mand according to the press release linked in that tweet , police have had an address in nã¸rrebro under surveillance .
around 5am local time ( approximately one hour ago ) a person of interest arrived at the address , was hailed by police and opened fire .
he was shot and killed .
no police officers were hit .
police are investigating whether the man they shot was behind both attacks in copenhagen on saturday .
they have no further information .
a press conference is scheduled for four hours ' time .
afp are now confirming that earlier tweet from copenhagen police .
agence france-presse ( @ afp ) # breaking : copenhagen police fire shots near train station , person hit

documents.title: shots fired by police at nã¸rrebro station , one person hit
text: reports from copenhagen police over twitter that they have fired shots at nã¸rrebro station , with one person hit .
translation : police have fired at nã¸rrebro station .
a person affected .
condition unknown .
more info will follow # politidk kã¸benhavns politi ( @ kobenhavnpoliti ) politiet har afgivet skud ved nã¸rrebro station .
en person er ramt .
tilstand ukendt .
nã¦rmere info vil tilgã¥ # politidk

here 's agence france-presse 's report of the press conference held a little earlier by danish police : a man died after being shot in the head near copenhagen 's main synagogue and two policemen were wounded , police said at a press conference early on sunday .
police were unable to confirm if the incident was related to saturday 's deadly shooting at a cultural centre in the danish capital where a debate on islam and free speech was being held .
it started with police being down at the site .
a person comes up and starts to shoot , police spokesman allan teddy wadsworth-hansen said .
the two police who were there were hit , one in the arm and one in the leg .
they are both currently receiving treatment .
their lives are not in danger , he added .
he declined to say if there was any link between the dead man and copenhagen 's main synagogue , which is just metres away from where the incident took place .
parts of the danish capital had been cordoned off but it 's not a question of a general curfew .
people are allowed to travel around copenhagen , safely , wadsworth-hansen said .
the australian prime minister , tony abbott , has joined other world leaders in condemning the attack on an art cafe in copenhagen on saturday .
the government condemns the shooting at a free speech event in copenhagen overnight .
the thoughts of all australians are with the people of denmark and , in particular , the family of the victim who lost his life and the police officers injured in this brutal act of terror .
as with the charlie hebdo atrocity in paris , the copenhagen attack is an affront to one of our most fundamental values freedom of speech .
we stand with the people and government of denmark in confronting this cynical attempt to undermine that fundamental right .
there are reports several other people have been injured in a separate shooting incident near a synagogue in copenhagen .
danish authorities have not yet established whether this is related to the earlier attack .
denmark is a partner in the international coalition that is working to disrupt , degrade and ultimately defeat the islamist death cult in iraq and syria .
recent attacks such as those in copenhagen and paris will only strengthen our resolve to combat isil , or daesh , [ isis ] and the evil it represents .
here in australia , the government will continue to do all it can to defend our way of life and protect our community from terrorism .
our national terrorism alert level remains at high , which means a terrorist attack is likely .

saturday 's attack on an art cafe holding a free speech event has eerie parallels to a foiled 2010 plot to attack jyllands-posten , the danish publication that first published images of the prophet muhammad in 2005 , to widespread revulsion among muslims .
in december 2010 , four heavily armed men were arrested while planning to attack the offices of the jyllands-posten in copenhagen 's city hall square .
a terrorism researcher , magnus ranstorp , offered this thought at the time of the charlie hedbo massacre : this attack could just as easily have happened in denmark .
to recap , that brings the death toll from this day of carnage in copenhagen to two people , both members of the public .
five people all police officers have been wounded .

documents.title: civilian killed in second shooting
text: according to a translation of the press conference currently under way , the two police officers wounded in the synagogue attack are now out of danger .
but a member of the public , who was shot multiple times in the head , has died .
sã¸ren martin olsen ( @ soerenmolsen ) police , after the shooting number two : `` two people are under treatment and out of danger .
a civilian is killed '' # cphshooting still no indication that the two attacks in the city in the past 24 hours are linked .
sã¸ren martin olsen ( @ soerenmolsen ) police : `` we have no indications if there is a link between the attacks . ''
# cphshooting

the danish islamic council has issued this statement on the attack on a cafe in krudttã¸nden earlier on saturday ( translated by @ twitterid9ace ) : the danish islamic council condemns in the strongest terms the attack on the culture centre krudttã¸nden in the east of copenhagen on saturday , 14 february 2015 , which led to the killing of a 40-year-old man and wounded three policemen and expresses its deepest sympathy for the family of the deceased and the injured policemen .

everything indicates that terrorism 's hands have struck in the danish capital copenhagen and targeted themselves at a cultural event on freedom of expression , whose weapons were just opinions , which all heavenly religions and secular laws reject .
the danish islamic council invites all in danish society to unite in the fight against extremism and terrorism .
the danish islamic council also expresses its wish for the offender to be quickly caught and held accountable for his actions .
sã¸ren martin olsen ( @ soerenmolsen ) now the press briefing begins in copenhagen at police headquarters # cphshooting we 'll bring you details from this press conference as soon as possible .

documents.title: what we know so far
text: denmark is in lockdown after three people , including two police officers , were shot outside copenhagen 's main synagogue .
roadblocks have been set up and a massive manhunt is currently underway .
it follows the killing about 10 hours earlier of one man and the wounding of three police officers at a free speech forum in the city earlier on saturday .
the target in that earlier incident is thought to have been lars vilks , a swedish cartoonist who has attracted controversy for his de of the prophet muhammad .
police have not said whether the two incidents are linked .
danish authorities are holding a press conference in about 5 minutes .
we 're being told that danish authorities will hold a press conference about 4am local time , about 30 mins from now .
meanwhile , here 's more footage from central denmark , currently in lockdown and swarming with police .
this absolutely chilling audio apparently captures the gunshots at the free speech forum on saturday in copenhagen .
the shooting begins about 18 seconds in .
according to this november report by john henley , denmark has produced more foreign jihadi fighters per capita than any country in europe bar belgium .
more than 100 young danes have fought or continue to fight in syria and iraq .
how to treat these men on their return has presented a dilemma for danish authorities .

from agence france-presse : as a manhunt was underway in central copenhagen , media described massive police action between the station and the botanical garden , and a helicopter was heard overhead outside afp 's office .
police are struggling with many drunk people in the area , which is close to many copenhagen pubs and nightclubs , the berlingske newspaper said on its website .
the danish emergency management agency urged people in central copenhagen to text i 'm okay to their families in a post on its twitter account .
here 's a map of the area that police are scouring , according to this report .
focus of police operation .
maps

as police continue to search the area surrounding krystalgade in downtown copenhagen , here 's a report from tablet magazine in march 2013 about rising fears within denmark 's jewish community about intolerance towards their faith .

israel 's ambassador to denmark , arthur avnon , had this to say to israelis in denmark in 2012 : we advise israelis who come to denmark and want to go to the synagogue to wait to don their skullcaps until they enter the building and not to wear them in the street , irrespective of whether the areas they are visiting are seen as being safe .
there are an estimated 8,000 jewish people in denmark , mostly in copenhagen .
the jewish presence in the country goes back more than 400 years .

here 's video from the near the scene in krystalgade , currently swarming with police ( tweet reads : lots of activity ) f. pradhan-blach ( @ fpb dk ) masser af aktivitet # politidk rasmus thau riddersh has tweeted this image from the scene ( tweet : policeman injured and man down in front of the jewish synagogue ) rasmus thau riddersh ( @ rtridder ) politimand sã¥ret og mand nede foran jã¸disk synagoge .

agence-france presse has this quick take on this latest shooting : one person was shot in the head and two policemen were shot in the arm and leg in central copenhagen , police said in a statement early sunday .
it was not confirmed if the incident was related to saturday 's deadly shooting at a cultural centre in copenhagen where a debate on islam and free speech was being held .
we can not say anything about the condition of the injured yet , copenhagen police said .
the perpetrator fled on foot , it said .
the shooting took place in krystalgade , a street that is home to copenhagen 's main synagogue .
the nearby noerreport train station , one of the country 's busiest , had been evacuated and trains were not stopping there , danish news agency ritzau reported , quoting train operator dsb .
people in central denmark have been advised to remain in their homes as a massive manhunt gets underway .
jewish news feed ( @ jewishfeed ) breaking photos : most used metro station in central copenhagen being evacuated by police .
a correction to that earlier report : there have been no confirmed deaths from the second shooting outside a copenhagen synagogue .
tinne hjersing ( @ tinnehjersing ) important # correction : the condition of the person shot in the head in the new # cphshooting is still unknown - not confirmed dead !
another report that police had apprehended a suspect has also been corrected .
so far nobody has been detained over this or the earlier shooting .
clearly , a lot of misinformation flying around in the aftermath of this incident .
dwayne ryan menezes ( @ dwayne menezes ) update : danish police correct earlier report by danish broadcasters : no suspects yet apprehended .
# copenhagenshooting # copenhagenattack
as we await more details on this latest shooting , here 's my colleague mark townsend on the earlier assault on a copenhagen cafe holding a free speech event .
danish police were hunting a suspected lone gunman after a 40-year-old man was killed and three officers injured when shots were fired at a copenhagen cafe hosting a freedom of speech debate .
the event had been organised by the controversial swedish artist lars vilks , who has faced repeated threats for caricaturing the prophet muhammad and believed he was the intended target .

witnesses described scores of bullets ripping through the window of the krudttã¸nden cafe in ãsterbro , near the centre of the city , shortly after 3.30pm , with a suspect fleeing by car after what was said to be an attempt to assassinate vilks .

police released a photograph of the suspect they were hunting as the danish prime minister , helle thorning-schmidt , called the shooting a terrorist attack and said the whole country was on high alert .
she said : we feel certain now that it 's a politically motivated attack , and thereby it is a terrorist attack .
our main priority at this stage is to catch the perpetrators and make sure that we find them as soon as possible .
read the full report here
reporter tinne hjersing from the danish daily berlingske has tweeted that one of the victims of the synagogue shooting has died .

tinne hjersing ( @ tinnehjersing ) # breaking a person is being reported dead after new shootings near a synagogue in copenhagen. # cphshooting she has more details : tinne hjersing ( @ tinnehjersing ) police says that 3 people are shot near a synagogue .
a person is shot in the head , two police officers hit in an arm and a leg .
# cphshooting tinne hjersing ( @ tinnehjersing ) to foreigners , here 's a map of the # cphshooting .
green dot is krudttã¸nden .
red dot is the synagogue in krystalgade .

documents.title: three reportedly shot outside copenhagen synagogue
text: welcome to our rolling coverage of this developing story from denmark , where three people , including two police officers , have reportedly been shot outside a copenhagen synagogue .

the incident follows the killing of one man and wounding of three police officers after a hail of bullets were fired into a copenhagen cafe during an event featuring swedish artist lars vilks , who has faced repeated threats for caricaturing the prophet muhammad .
police have released an image of the suspect , posted below .
news of this latest shooting has only just emerged , and it remains unclear whether the two incidents are linked .
we 'll update this blog as more details emerge .
copenhagen police released this image of a man who passed a camera shortly after four people were shot , one fatally , in a cafe , and two people fled in a car .
denmark/reuters
